Summary: 3 Orange Hazy Lights in a Triangular Slow-Moving Triangular Pattern
divs: sighting detailsi am an avid reader of books on the subjects of ufo's and ancient civilizations. and as much as i believe nothing could prepare me for this encounter at 7 a.m. 10-14-08. i was startled when my mother suddenly woke me from my sleep telling me very nervously to come outside. i did. she pointed to the dark sky in a southeasternly direction. at first, my sleep still fresh in my eyes, i noticed nothing unusual. but as my eyes came into focus i saw what she had pointed out. what looked to be bright stars suddenly were recognized as orange and had a distinct hazy radiance about them. could just be stars i told myself. and that could have easily been left at that. but as i noticed there where 3 of them i looked from one to the next and noticed they where moving very slowly- but yes! they were moving. and not only moving but were holding a distinct triangular\boomerang pattern! i was excited yet baffled. in all the years i have studied the clues left in the history of earth's civilisation's encounters and books i have read- i had never seen any! as i watched they slowly faded from view. the sky still black at this point! also i looked up reports for the area and found several simialar sightings describing the same recently. what is this phenomenom? sincerely, brandon
trends: There have been 14 other sightings in Warren
There were no other sightings in Warren on or around October 14th 2008
